277237.「くそっ。もう 動けねぇ。\n へなちょこ海賊団の 新入り風情が\n なんだって:
Damn. I can't move anymore. How can such a
weak pirate newcomer be so strong!

277238.「ハルバルド海賊団の首領 ハルバルド。\n ヴェリナード女王 ディオーレ様の御下:
Halbard, leader of the Halbard Pirates. By
order of Queen Diore of Verinard, I arrest you
and your pirate band.

277239.「大手柄じゃないか アンタ。\n アタイたちも 少しは 役に立ったかい？:
You're a big shot, aren't you? Did me help you
at least a little bit?

277240.「しかし コイツと組むなんて\n <cs_pchero>も 思い切ったことをした:
But <cs_pchero> did a bold thing to team up
with this guy. Well, thanks to you, I'm saved.

277241.「組んだ覚えはない。利用しただけだ。:
I don't remember teaming up with him. I just
used him.

277242.「そうかい。それでも いいよ。\n ハルバルド海賊団は これでオシマイだし\n:
Oh, I see. I'm fine with that. The Halbard
Pirates are done, and we've got the treasure
map, so there's nothing to complain about.

277243.「ならば 宝探し程度で 満足しておけ。\n 今回は お前たちの海賊団の名が 命令:
Then be content with a treasure hunt. It's
just that your pirates' names weren't
mentioned in the orders this time.

277244.「だが 海賊は 海賊だ。\n オレは 絶対に 許さない……。: But pirates are pirates. I'll never forgive...

277245.「いちいち 気に障ることを言うヤツだね。\n 魔法戦士ってのは もっと オシャレ:
You're the kind of guy who says things that
bother me every time. I thought armamentalists
were supposed to be more stylish and smart...

277246.「さあ 船に戻ろうか <cs_pchero>。\n 悪いけど 後で アンタも\n:
Let's get back to the ship <cs_pchero>. I'm
sorry, but maybe later you can face khao to
the captain's room for me, too?

277247.「秘宝の地図を 手に入れたとはいえ\n マドロックのヤツ 怒ってるだろうからね。:
Madlock's probably pissed off that we received
the treasure map. You'll just have to make it
up to him.

277248.「なんだ この地図は……？\n こんなもんが 本当に お宝の地図なのかよ！:
What is this map...? Is this really a treasure
map?

277249.「謎かけでも 仕掛けられてるんじゃないのかい？\n もっと よく見てみなよ。:
Is there some kind of riddle being played on
you? Look more closely.

277250.「だってよぉ。地形みてえなのすら ないんだぜ。\n なあ。ニセモンを つかまされ:
Because, you know. There's not even a
topography. Hey. Maybe they gave us a fake.

277251.「そんなはずは ないよ。\n あれは 確かな情報だったんだ。: That's not possible. It was solid information.

277252.「アタイにも 貸してみな……っと！: Let me know if I can borrow it!

277253.「てめぇ！ どういうつもりだっ！？: Hey!! What do you think you're doing?!

277254.「この地図は アタイが いただいていく。\n アンタみたいな ウドの大木に\n:
I'm taking this map. There's no way a big udo
tree like you can find the treasure!

277255.「最初から 地図を奪うつもりだったってか。\n だが ここから 無事に帰れるなん:
You were planning to take the map from the
beginning. But you don't think you'll make it
back in one piece from here, do you...?

277257.「てめぇは……。\n あのときの 魔法戦士か！？: Are you... the armamentalist from back then?

277258.「アタイを 放っとくわけないと思ったよ。\n 魔法戦士の兄チャンを 連れてくると:
I knew they wouldn't leave me alone. I didn't
expect him to bring his armamentalist brother.

277259.「悪いね。アイツの相手は まかせるよ。\n アタイは この地図を 守らないとさ。:
I'm sorry. I'll leave him to you. Me, I have
to protect this map.

277260.「なんだぁ 小娘？ 新入りごときに\n ワシの相手が務まるって 言いてえのか？\:
What is it, little girl? You think you can
handle me? Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah...

277262.「うるせぇ！\n てめぇの相手は 後だ！！: Shut up! I'll deal with you later!

277264.「海賊の礼儀ってのを てめぇの身体に\n たたき込んでやる。覚悟しろよっ！！:
I'm going to teach you some pirate etiquette.
Prepare yourself!
